description: This file defines the main React application component for a recipe explorer web app. It includes hooks for routing based on URL hash, a simple state store, and components for listing recipes and showing recipe details. It also manages navigation, user interactions, and rendering of the UI.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Custom hook managing local state for query and selected index, used for sharing state within the app.

methods.name: useHashRoute
methods.description: Custom hook implementing a minimal hash-based router supporting routes for home and recipe detail views.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that ties together routing, state, and rendering of either the home page or recipe detail page.
